request.description:
### Auth Login

This endpoint allows users to log in and obtain an authentication token.

#### Request Body

- email (string): The email address of the user.
    
- password (string): The password of the user.
    
- app (string): The application identifier.
    

#### Response

The response is a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "message": "",
    "data": {
        "firstname": "",
        "lastname": "",
        "phone": null,
        "plan": null,
        "plan_duration": null,
        "student_status": "",
        "last_login": "",
        "deviceID": null,
        "parent_email": null,
        "parent_phone": null,
        "token": ""
    }
}

 ```

request.description:
### Logout

This endpoint is used to log the user out by invalidating the authentication token.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

- Status: 200
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

Example response body:

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "message": ""
}

 ```

request.description:
### GET /payments/plans

This endpoint retrieves a list of payment plans.

#### Request

No request body is required for this endpoint.

#### Response

The response will be a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "status": "200 OK",
    "message": "Payment plans retrieved successfully.",
    "payment_plans": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Daily Plan",
            "amount": "100.00",
            "duration": 1,
            "description": "Access to premium features for a single day.",
            "created_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Weekly Plan",
            "amount": "500.00",
            "duration": 7,
            "description": "Access to premium features for a week.",
            "created_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "name": "Monthly Plan",
            "amount": "1200.00",
            "duration": 31,
            "description": "Access to premium features for a month.",
            "created_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "name": "Yearly Plan",
            "amount": "14400.00",
            "duration": 366,
            "description": "Access to premium features for a year.",
            "created_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-12-07T06:52:05.000000Z"
        }
    ]
}

 ```

request.description:
The endpoint makes an HTTP POST request to {{BASE_URL}}/payments/pay/:planId to initiate a payment for a specific plan.

### Response

The response for this request can be represented as a JSON schema:

``` json
{
    "status": "201 Created",
    "message": "Payment link generated successfully.",
    "paystack": {
        "url": "https://checkout.paystack.com/s4r2xcy8ljz87b3"
    },
    "payment": {
        "status": "pending",
        "user_id": 4,
        "payment_plan_id": 1,
        "reference": "ERVwI3xcA7isYw6MoCgN0dXAo",
        "amount": 10000,
        "updated_at": "2024-12-07T17:04:58.000000Z",
        "created_at": "2024-12-07T17:04:58.000000Z",
        "id": 4
    },
    "reference": "ERVwI3xcA7isYw6MoCgN0dXAo"
}

 ```

### GET /payments/verify/:trx_reference

This endpoint retrieves payment verification details for a specific transaction reference.

#### Request

No request body parameters are required for this endpoint.

- `trx_reference` (path parameter) : The unique transaction reference for which payment verification details are to be retrieved.
    

#### Response

The response for this request is in the form of a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "status": "200 OK",
    "message": "Payment verified successfully.",
    "data": {
        "plan_expires_at": "2024-12-09T18:19:37.000000Z",
        "payment_plan_id": 1,
        "user_id": 4
    }
}

 ```

The response includes the following fields:

- `status` : The status of the payment verification.
    
- `message` : Any additional message related to the payment verification status.
    
- `data` : An object containing details about the payment, including the expiration date of the payment plan, the ID of the payment plan, and the user ID associated with the payment.
    

#### Example

``` json
{
  "status": "",
  "message": "",
  "data": {
    "plan_expires_at": "",
    "payment_plan_id": 0,
    "user_id": 0
  }
}

 ```
